Experiment Method.Assay Method: In vitro kinase assay and protein stability analysis

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using transfected mammalian cell lines with GFP or myc tags.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: moderate effect on kinase activity and protein stability
Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression levels were similar to wild-type, with a modest reduction in kinase activity.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: significant destabilization of the protein and reduced kinase activity
Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression levels were significantly lower, with a marked reduction in kinase activity.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels and kinase activity within expected ranges for wild-type protein.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels significantly reduced compared to wild-type, with corresponding reductions in kinase activity.

Approved assay.Description: The experimental protocol is generally used for studying the effects of genetic variants on protein stability and function in vitro.
